episode_summary: This episode of "No Such Thing As A Fish" covers a variety of intriguing topics, including the surprising origins of the Muppets' designer, a German military uniform mishap, a humorous incident involving a tram named after an actress, and the disputed origins of the banana split dessert.

facts.fact: Many of the Muppets were designed and created by someone called Kermit Love who had absolutely nothing to do with Kermit the Frog.
The German army has just had to tear out some of the size labels from their new uniforms because they read small, short, or SS.
In 2015, the actor Vicky McClure was kicked off the Vicky McClure tram for not having a ticket.
Because nobody can decide where it was invented, there's currently a split in the banana splits world.
